name: JSTextView
tagline: A custom, clean, intuitive, and useful text view for iOS - with simple one step integration
body:
JSTextView ========== A custom, clean, and useful text view for iOS, with simple one step integration How to implement
Integration of JSTextView is simple. All you need to do is copy JSTextViewClass .h & .m files into your Xcode project, and then: -Add a standard UITextView to your Storyboard/xib file. Set its class to JSTextViewClass by selecting the identity inspector on the left pane That's it! You are now using a custom text view We hope you like it. If you have any questions, send us an email at jasolomon@99centsappdevelopment.com
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
